name: Guardian Snowman, Lazzard
description:
An outbreak of Emberblazes are threatening to burn everything down. Only Lazzard the Guardian Snowman can douse this problem!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS - MOUSE AND KEYBOARD:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

CONTROLS - CONTROLLER:

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Aim

Bumper Buttons - Shoot

Trigger Buttons - Speed Up
